title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 368.5 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 368.5 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations
(a) Requests for public access to records shall be accepted and records produced
during all hours regularly open for business. (b) These hours are: 8:30 a.m. to 5
p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
368.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
